mapper.select: select v.id as id, v.linkImageVenue as linkImageVenue, v.titleVenue as titleVenue, v.addressVenue as addressVenue,v.capacityVisitor as capacityVisitor,v.capacityParkir as capacityParkir, v.luasBangunan as luasBangunan,v.luasTanah as luasTanah,v.hargaVenue as hargaVenue, c.id as idCity, c.city_name as locationVenue from venue v inner join city c on v.idCity = c.id where v.`status` = 1 order by v.titleVenue asc
